mapper.insert: insert into return_records (id, user_id, borrow_id, return_date, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, borrow_id, return_date, status from return_records
